title: My Wife is a Workaholic - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Early Romance   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Modern Day   Protagonist Falls in Love First
author: 元夕看灯
description:
What was it like to have a top boss who is mysterious and powerful in the eyes of the outside world when he was a virtuous husband and perfect in the roles of washing clothes, cooking food, and taking care of the children for you every day?

The overbearing female President Zu Jin: Cool!

Zu Jin took a fancy to this man after taking an insightful look at him on the side of the road.

He was tall and handsome; he was calm and quiet. He looked easy to control…….

However, when she was about to take the initiative to attack and pursue him, she accidentally learned of the man’s true identity.

Zu Jin was extremely disappointed: I wanted to catch you. After we marry, I will earn money to support the family and you can be a full time cook and take care of the children. But who would have known you had this kind of identity.

……what else can I say.

The man calmly smiled: I think your idea is feasible.

Zu Jin: Slips away~

Straightforward tyrant and workaholic female president vs virtuous cook, husband, and black-bellied boss>
